commitResults.messageBody: Added Level-0 functionality with the "Dude" chatbot.

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit class names to be consistent as instructed
Add classes to help with formatting, indentation etc.
commitResults.messageBody: Added a "Display" class to manage the entire display of the User Interface, and a "Dialog" class to generate a text box and indentation between linebreaks
Program greets the user, echos commands until "bye" is given.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix minor bugs relating to dialog box enforcement
commitResults.messageBody: The dialog box should be more robust and able to take in words longer than the max line space.
Program now can add to a list of tasks to do
Allows for dialog box to take in more items than the height of the ASCII art. List can now support up to 100 items. Additional minor bug fixes for indentation
Added the ability to mark and unmark tasks. Added the "ToDoItem" class to contain all the information each task can provide.
Made sure that the constructor initializes "isDone" as false

commitResults.messageTitle: Format code to adhere with coding standard
Refactor indent function into multiple parts
commitResults.messageBody: Made it easier to read and parse. Also should be the most robust indentation possible and should not break.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change format to fit code style
commitResults.messageBody: Made sure that there is no space between the method declaration and the brackets (e.g. doSomething() )

commitResults.messageTitle: Reorganize code to follow coding standard
commitResults.messageBody: Moved around some variable declarations to follow the intermediate rules of the coding standard
